title: Cleveland teen shoots himself in the foot
content:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- A 15-year-old Cleveland boy was taken to an area hospital after he shot himself in the foot, a Cleveland police spokeswoman said.
The shooting happened about 9:40 p.m. at a home on East 70th Street south of Wade Park Avenue.
The boy was listed in stable condition, Det. Jennifer Ciaccia said in a brief press release sent Friday.
Additional details of the shooting were not immediately available. It's unclear if the boy will face any criminal charges in the incident.
